body.name: Vision Home Natural Pinch Pleated Semi Sheer Curtains Textured Linen Blended Light Filtering Window Curtains 95 inch for Living Room Bedroom Pinch Pleat Drapes with Hooks 2 Panels 42" Wx95 L

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 58 mins
features: Ready Made:Each package includes 2 panels of pinch pleated curtain with 18 hooks(without rings),measuring 42"Wx95"L each panel.

Pinch Pleats Design:Each beige curtain panel with 7 pinch pleats generates modern and luxury feel.Linen curtains provide a natural,organic,and textured look that complements a variety of interior styles.By offering linen curtains in various colors,patterns,and lengths,we can cater to customers looking for a casual yet sophisticated window treatment.Hanging these pinch pleat curtains to elevate your windows and increase the aesthetic value to any spaces,bedroom,living room,nursery,office,etc.
Balance Between Light and Privacy:Light filtering curtains can filter a part of harsh sunlight and not see through to provide privacy.

Multiple Hanging Ways:Rustic Casual curtains have 3 hanging options to meet your different home décor needs:back tabs(4 inch),clip rings or ring hooks.Please note that 18 hooks are in the package but clips and rings are not included.Two weighted hems sewn at the bottom increase the draping effect.
Easy Care:The curtains are machine washable in cold.Gentle cycle and do not bleach.Tumble dry low and iron on lowest setting as needed. Customized sizes are available upon request.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent quality for 108" curtains at this price point! Curtains at this length can be so pricey. These curtains look so much more expensive than they are. I love them. The are light filtering yet still provide privacy and have a nice heavy weight to them but look airy. The weights sewn into the bottom make them hang beautifully. Curtain hooks are included which is nice if you want to hang them on curtain rings instead of the back tabs . The only issue I have is that I ordered a second pair for more fullness and the second pair is a different color than the first. both say "white" but one pair is an off white, while the other pair is a pure white seen side by side they definitely differ in color. Even though natural was sold out in 108" I think I received natural for one pair, either that or the dye lot is off. So now I'm going to order another pair so that I will have a matching set and return the pair that has the off color. All that being said, I'm not deducting a star because of the color snafu, stuff happens. I still would highly recommend these curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice curtains for the price
reviews.reviewText: * read update*These may not be the sturdiest of all the curtains, I already had a tiny bit of unraveling while I was adjusting the pins, but that's hidden, that's why I knocked one star. Only concern is how they'll last pulling them open and closed after a while. But for the price, they look gorgeous. Color is perfect, and they get the look of the Two Pages or any other pricey custom drapes for less than half the price. Love that they come two per package. I needed 4 panels and it was a fraction of the cost for the others I looked at even here on Amazon. Overall I'm very satisfied, these will at least last until I get bored with the style and I'll know I didn't invest way too much in them to change them out in a few years.3 month update: I loved these curtains so much I bought two more sets for my bedroom. These are definitely holding up to daily opening and closing, they hang so nicely, they filter the light nicely and provide adequate privacy. If you don't need custom sizes curtains, but want the luxe, custom linen look, don't hesitate to try these out. Returns/exchanges are so simple (I ordered the wrong size for the bedroom and got my refund right away to reorder) and the quality was just as good for the next sets as for the first. I may have been the problem with the first set, I actually figured out how to insert the pins without causing any unraveling, so for that I give them 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality!! Not cheap looking
reviews.reviewText: I don’t leave reviews…. But had to for these drapes. Quality linen fabric…. Not thin for a sheer….. and not wrinkle impossible like a linen shirt or pants. Perfect for privacy and the light to come through. (Cloudy day in pics) Pinch pleats are well done. Comes with hooks to add to rings. I did steam them. Color is lighter than in my pictures……. Dusty blue gray…. Amazon pic is pretty close to color accuracy.. True to length and have corner weights! Only disappointment is they don’t come in green too. A++ and price perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like it’s custom!
reviews.reviewText: Took 3 minutes to put up (had to get the ladder). Perfect. Nice material. Great design. Fit perfectly mThank you whoever made this!Our dog likes it too - he can use his nose to move the curtain to see who is there n

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natural and neat look
reviews.reviewText: I like how natural they look. The pinch pleat looks very expensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my living room to replace the cotton curtains that shrank considerably when I had them cleaned. These look very nice and hang well due to the weighted hem. They are light filtering which is what I wanted. I should note that I wanted to use the hook method for hanging but the hook was too small to go around my rod. I didn’t want to use rings because it would have made them hang too low and I didn’t want to raise my curtain rods. The tab backs work alright even though it wasn’t exactly the pinch pleat look I was hoping for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best curtains for the budget!
reviews.reviewText: I've been through a whole journey with curtain for the last 2-3 months. I bought from different expensive shops, but every time something did not workout either the fabric was off or the color was off.. not even considering the price. I tried cheaper ones from amazon but the fabric wasn't good, it looked cheap. And right when i gave up i saw some blogger posted a reference for these curtains saying they were from amazon, so i decided to give amazon another chance. Because the price is so inexpensive.And i'm happy above and beyond, i had to sew the tape myself bc i have a curtain rail, though they are ready to go if you have a rod. It looks very natural, expensive, just the look that i was going for, the fabric is flowy, not to mention it has little weights at the corner of each panel.it is still a little wrinkled on the picture as it is just our of the packaging.thank you. I would definetely recomend this and buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These drapes are really nice and well made. I used two panels on each side of my standard size sliding door and they look full and all matched perfectly. They are sheer enough to let light through, but offer enough privacy to obfuscate the view. They are more of a beige color but have some white threads throughout. After studying many drapes I picket these and so happy I did!
